Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-8177 affecting package libtiff for versions less than 4.6.0-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-8177 affecting package libtiff for versions less than 4.6.0-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libtiff is earlier than 4.6.0-7, affected by CVE-2025-8177
